author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/cult-of-the-lamb/

A lost God calls you from a mysterious mountain—rebuild the flock and reawaken winter to uncover the truth of the fallen lambs. Face the past before it consumes you in this full-length expansion for Cult of the Lamb.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #cultofthelamb
title: Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven - Ranching Overview Gameplay Video | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005308

Make your Halloween special with Scared Stiff, now available in Pinball FX!

Elvira is back to rattle your bones in the classic Scared Stiff pinball table! Join the Mistress of the Dark herself on a quest to “raise the dead” by completing six spooky tales.

Key Features:

- Fully authentic recreation of the 1996 arcade original
- Original Elvira voice lines and sound effects
- Six unique horror-themed modes
- Classic mechanical feel with modern enhancements

Do you have the guts to get Scared Stiff?

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #pinballfx
title: Pinball FX - Williams Pinball: Scared Stiff - Release Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005308

It’s party time in the graveyard, and you’re invited! 

In Elvira and the Party Monsters, the Mistress of the Dark herself hosts a frightful evening packed with creepy creatures, sizzling shots, and multiball madness. Light up the dance floor as you bash the monsters, raise the dead, and keep the party alive with every flip.

Key Features:

- Faithful recreation of the 1989 arcade original
- Classic monster-party theme with unique modes and challenges
- Jackpots, skill shots, and graveyard challenges to master
- Elvira’s signature voice lines and cheeky commentary

The monsters are waiting… what are you bringing to the party?

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #pinballfx #elvira
title: Pinball FX - Williams Pinball: Elvira and the Party Monsters - Release Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-crew-motorfest/

New seasons, new gameplay modes, improved customization options, a race creator tool, RC cars and a new playground island: get ready for The Crew Motorfest Year 3, starting on November 5.

In this new gameplay deep dive, discover the major additions coming to The Crew Motorfest in Year 3. Rediscover street racing with new gameplay, new vehicles, new rims and the possibility to change your car stance! And starting in March: get ready for a new playground island, a race creator tool, and many more exciting features coming your way!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #thecrewmotorfest
title: The Crew Motorfest - Year 3 Deep Dive Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Starsand Island — the cozy Chinese countryside life sim!
Free demo now.
Demo does not include the surprise collaboration with My Time at Portia or guest appearances by Gust and Ginger — these will be available in the full game upon official release.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Starsand Island - Some Encounters Feel Like Fate: Affinity Showcase | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008409/

All available units - please respond! Try before you buy and check the free trial version of Firefighting Simulator: Ignite now available on PlayStation5. Face unpredictable dangers head-on, battle intense blazes with your crew, and save lives when every second counts. From roaring house fires to industrial infernos, the call is yours to answer.  Gear up. Roll out. Be the hero Oakridge City needs. 

#ps5 #ps5games #firefightingsimulatorignite
title: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite - Free Trial Version Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The Cabin Factory is out now!
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015561/

Experience an anomaly-hunting horror game inspired by liminal spaces and psychological horror walking simulators.

Your job at the Cabin Factory is simple - inspect the cabins and decide whether they’re haunted or not. And if you find any anomalies, get out… immediately.

FEATURES:
- An atmospheric horror experience - explore haunted cabins alone and try not to lose your sanity,
- A compact story - experience the entire game in a single evening,
- Available in 13 languages - choose your preferred one and fully immerse yourself in the game.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #cabinfactory
title: The Cabin Factory - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011030

Ember Knights, the 1-4 players fast paced action roguelite, is now available on PS5! 
Wield weapons & skills, build synergies with game-changing relics and free the universe of Praxis’ corruption.
With the Heroes of the Nexus Edition comes both the base game, the Wrath of the Architect DLC and the online crossplay. 

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Ember Knights: Heroes of the Nexus Edition - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

With traps, Ghost Ships and Phantoms added to the usual array of snarling skeletons, they're sure to be a heated test for any crews seeking to secure the Vault's potentially hefty haul. Plus, there are some lovely rewards available for contesting them, too...
